mapper.select: SELECT pd.id , pd.context_kh , pd.context_en , pd.context_ch , pd.create_date , pd.modify_date , pd.status , (SELECT u.user_name FROM user_ u WHERE u.id = pd.create_by) as "create_by" , (SELECT u.user_name FROM user_ u WHERE u.id = pd.modify_by) as "modify_by" FROM product_detials pd where pd.status != #{status}

SELECT pd.id , pd.context_kh , pd.context_en , pd.context_ch , pd.create_date , pd.modify_date , pd.status , (SELECT u.user_name FROM user_ u WHERE u.id = pd.create_by) as "create_by" , (SELECT u.user_name FROM user_ u WHERE u.id = pd.modify_by) as "modify_by" FROM product_detials pd where pd.ids = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product_detials ( id , context_kh , context_en , context_ch , create_date , create_by , status ) VALUES ( #{id} , COALESCE(#{context_kh}, '') , COALESCE(#{context_en}, '') , COALESCE(#{context_ch}, '') , to_char(NOW(), 'YYYYMMDD') , #{user_id} , #{status} )
